import React, { useState } from 'react' import './AddProduct.css' import upload_area from "../Assets/upload_area.jpg" const AddProduct = () => { const [image,setImage] = useState(false); const [productDetails, setProductDetails] = useState({ name:"", image:"", category:"nature", price:"" }) const imageHandler = (e)=>{ setImage(e.target.files[0]); } const changeHandler = (e) =>{ setProductDetails({...productDetails,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const Add_product = async ()=>{ console.log(productDetails); } return (
